quote: That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.
Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
The true value of a human being is determined primarily by how he has attained liberation from the self.
We speak not only to tell other people what we think, but to tell ourselves what we think. Speech is a part of thought.
Not in his speech, not in his thoughts, I see his greatness, only in his actions, in his life.
To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
A good traveler leaves no tracks. Good speech lacks fault-finding.
To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
Freedom of the press is limited to those who own one.
Although I Would love to live with darkness and black, but I don't appreciate wickedness that impels human mind to become black.
Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement.
I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.
